item.title: Report X-2024051846
item.description:
Report X-2024051846

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-14T15:12:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-29
  • City: FORT MILL
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 5/29/2024 at approximately 0945, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call fron Employee 3962724 at the ramp facility in Aguadilla, PR, reporting an environmentally hazardous substance spill. The shipmment consisted by 4 fiberboard boxes, each containing one plastic drum. The shipment appeared wet on the bottom. Furhter investigation revealed that the inner contents had indeed spill from the top due to mishandling. The entire shipment will be set for disposal, as it cannot move any further in the FedEx network.
